ServiceSid.description: The SID of the [Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/notify/api/service-resource) to read the resource from.

StartDate.description: Only include usage that has occurred on or after this date. Specify the date in GMT and format as `YYYY-MM-DD`.

EndDate.description: Only include usage that occurred on or before this date. Specify the date in GMT and format as `YYYY-MM-DD`.

Identity.description: The [User](https://www.twilio.com/docs/chat/rest/user-resource)'s `identity` value of the resources to read.

Tag.description: Only list Bindings that have all of the specified Tags. The following implicit tags are available: `all`, `apn`, `fcm`, `gcm`, `sms`, `facebook-messenger`. Up to 5 tags are allowed.

PageSize.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.

Page.description: The page index. This value is simply for client state.

PageToken.description: The page token. This is provided by the API.
